sentences.sContent: The spring thaw caused the river to deluge the region.
sentences.sContent_eng: The spring thaw caused the river to deluge the region.
sentences.sCn: 春天冰雪融化，使河水泛滥淹没了那地区。

phrases.pCn: 密集洒水系统；集水系统；雨淋灭火系统

remMethod.val: de (往下) + luge (看作luv， 冲) → 洪水冲下堤坝 → 泛滥

trans.tranCn: 使泛滥； 淹， 浸； 压倒
trans.tranOther: to cover something with a lot of water
